name: Fire in winter
description:
A short puzzlescript game about fuelling a fire with wood and using your trusty teleporter block to help you.

Mobile friendly version: https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=5c0fb6f10e0d06e2f221f6b2d7237cb6

Source code: https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=5c0fb6f10e0d06e2f221f6b2d7237cb6
